attributes.action: Stop the propagande surrounding climate change. Admit it is a natural phenomina. and spot punitave taxation on something out of the individuals control.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When will the government stop supporting this propaganda. Global warming is natural not man made. Extreme weather is a feature of solar activity not CO2 or any other human activity. These lies have gone far enough they are affecting children for goodness sake. I expect better of the UK government. Get the truth not the spin it’s what the tax payer wants of you on such an important issue.
